title: Interrupting an Important Personal Task for Authority
vignette: Someone is deeply focused on a personal task, such as completing an important project or a quiet moment of reflection. A high-ranking authority figure suddenly arrives. Ignoring them could lead to serious consequences.

options.text: Continue the task; do not interrupt important personal work.
Interrupt and acknowledge to avoid negative consequences.

title: Interrupting a Personal Task for a Respected Mentor
vignette: A person is in the middle of a demanding personal activity when their highly respected mentor appears. Should they pause to greet the mentor?

options.text: Do not interrupt; the personal activity takes precedence.

title: Personal Activities on Company Time
vignette: Employees are spending a significant portion of their paid work hours on personal tasks unrelated to their jobs.

options.text: Focus on work tasks to not misuse company time.

title: Performing a Necessary Personal Routine in a Compromised Situation
vignette: During a difficult journey where stopping might be dangerous or costly, someone needs to perform a necessary routine like taking medication.

options.text: Stop to perform the routine despite the risk.
Continue and perform the routine as best as possible in the compromised situation.

title: Optimal Individual Timing vs. Group Participation
vignette: A person can perform a valued activity at what they see as the perfect time or wait to do it as part of a group, which has its own benefits.

options.text: Wait and perform the activity with the group.
Perform the activity immediately by oneself.

title: Group Ritual vs. Urgent Personal Commitments
vignette: After a shared activity, the group wants to do a brief customary follow-up. One member has urgent personal or professional matters elsewhere.

options.text: Stay and join the group ritual.
Leave early to attend to urgent matters.

title: Valuable/Sensitive Item in an Unhygienic Place
vignette: Someone needs to use a public restroom while carrying an item of great personal value. Leaving it outside risks theft, but taking it inside exposes it to an unhygienic place.

options.text: Bring the item inside for safekeeping.
Leave the item outside to avoid unhygienic conditions.
